meanings.definition: To divide into four equal parts.
meanings.sent1: She quadrated the pizza to share it with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The cake was quadrated into equal slices for the party.
meanings.sent3: The teacher quadrated the class into groups for a fun activity.
meanings.sent4: His love for math quadrated his interest in geometry.
meanings.sent5: The garden was quadrated into neat sections for different plants.

meanings.definition: To square or raise to the fourth power.
meanings.sent1: He quadrated the number to find the area of the square field.
meanings.sent2: The architect quadrated the measurements to ensure accuracy in the blueprint.
meanings.sent3: The scientist quadrated the data to analyze the results.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement quadrated when she won the math competition.
meanings.sent5: The music quadrated the emotions of the audience during the performance.
